description: Manuel Skye, like Tomas Brand, is in demand in the daddy-top role, and there are no two better guys than Allen King and Max Avila to share him. Allen and Max are into each other big time, and they pour all their energy into behaving like two stepbrothers sharing their stepdad behind closed doors. The question is this: who makes their daddy come first?
title: Allen King And Max Avila Share Manuel Skye’s Uncut Cock
